Hero.title: Talshir-IBC
Hero.description: Development, manufacturing, and marketing of unique products in the construction industry.
Hero.highlight: All products hold unique patents and exclusive designs.

About.title: About Talshir
About.description: Talshir-IBC is a premier company in the construction industry, specializing in the development, manufacturing, and marketing of innovative, high-quality solutions.
About.mission: At Talshir-IBC, we are committed to redefining the construction industry through cutting-edge innovation, precision engineering, and sustainable practices. As a certified developer and manufacturer, we strive to create durable, efficient, and forward-thinking solutions that enhance infrastructure, improve safety, and elevate industry standards. Our mission is to empower construction professionals with advanced materials and technologies that drive progress and long-term success.
About.vision: Our vision is to be a global leader in construction innovation, pioneering the next generation of building solutions. We aim to shape the future of the industry by continuously pushing the boundaries of technology, sustainability, and craftsmanship. Through a customer-centric approach, strategic partnerships, and a relentless pursuit of excellence, we aspire to create a lasting impact on the built environment while maintaining our core values of quality, integrity, and innovation.

WhyUs.title: Why Choose Our Patents
WhyUs.description: We provide cutting-edge solutions for leading construction companies and private developers in Israel.

card1.title: Unique Designs
card1.description: Innovative, high-quality, and eco-friendly materials, engineered for durability and efficiency in modern construction.

card2.title: Expert Guidance
card2.description: Our experienced engineers and designers work closely with clients, offering tailored solutions and expert advice at every stage.

card3.title: Reliable Delivery
card3.description: We ensure fast, secure, and transparent delivery with blockchain-backed tracking, keeping your projects on schedule.

card4.title: Global Standards
card4.description: Trusted by international construction leaders, our products meet the highest global quality and safety benchmarks.

card5.title: Customer Focus
card5.description: We prioritize client needs, offering personalized support, responsive service, and a commitment to long-term satisfaction.

card6.title: Strong Partnerships
card6.description: Collaborating with industry leaders, we develop solutions that integrate seamlessly with evolving construction demands.

Coops.title: Serving Industry Leaders
Coops.description: Empowering top construction companies and private developers with advanced, innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, sustainability, and project success.

Products.title: Our Solutions
Products.description: Talshir-IBC's products span various industries, including infrastructure, residential, commercial, and industrial construction.

ProductsList.modelDescription: A standardized concrete form spacer ensuring maximal precision in placing concrete forms and meshes, saving time, money, and manpower.
modelUsage: Universal plastic accessory, easy to install with a click.
Designed for casting concrete walls, columns, and beams.
Maintains standard spaces between reinforcing meshes and forms.

ProductsList.modelDescription: A specialized spacer designed for specific reinforcement needs in construction projects.
modelUsage: Ensures proper spacing between reinforcement elements.

ProductsList.modelDescription: The 'Sharon' Bench is designed to support upper reinforcement in ceilings, ensuring stability and precise positioning.
modelUsage: Suitable for ceilings with a thickness of 20–27 cm.
Easy and quick assembly with a bottom iron clip.
Provides a straight line for mounting support iron to the net.
Cost-effective, requiring 1 unit per square meter of upper mesh.
High load resistance, with each bench supporting up to 200 kg.

ProductsList.modelDescription: A circular distance guard with a diameter of 8 cm, suitable for various building elements.
modelUsage: Applicable for walls, columns, beams, and ceilings.
Easy and quick to assemble, attaching easily to iron.
Cost-effective, suitable for all construction elements.
Available in concrete cover thicknesses of 2.5 cm and 3 cm.

ProductsList.modelDescription: A premium protective tube spacer designed to maintain proper spacing and prevent water infiltration.
modelUsage: Ensures correct distance between reinforcing mesh and framework.
Built-in sealing rings prevent water infiltration along the pipe.
Significant savings in expenses and labor.
Available in lengths up to 200 cm.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Designed to level prefabricated concrete elements such as walls, columns, and beams during installation.
A reusable accessory that maintains the correct distance between concrete form panels.
modelUsage: Reduces the need for manual measurements.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Securely holds pipes within concrete walls or slabs during casting.
modelUsage: Prevents pipes from floating during pouring.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Protects the ends of rebars from damage and prevents injuries.
Ensures consistent concrete cover over rebars in slabs and walls.
modelUsage: Prevents corrosion by maintaining proper cover.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Quickly attaches rebars together without the need for wire ties.
Used to create consistent gaps between concrete panels and maintain proper spacing.
Maintains a fixed distance between double-wall prefabricated elements during casting.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Our team of experts is here for you.
